title: "DEMS > datalab"
site: distill::distill_website
---

The Data Science Lab (datalab) is a competence center combining the expertise of leading scientists in the key research fields of data science. 
**datalab** builds on synergies and leverages on collective expertise to solve real-world data challenges by trasforming information to knowledge. 

datalab is housed within the [DEMS](https://dems.unimib.it/it/ricerca/centri-ricerca) at University of Milano-Bicocca.
